Articles.Content: First of all, I tried the stickied tutorial but it doesn't seem to work in the latest version of Unity. So I was wondering if any of you wonderful, generous modders out there happened to know how in the heck to make emissives work?
Rollback to the previous version of unity, not sure which one. Google something along the lines of "KSP unity emissives"

roll back to 4.2.2 or earlier is easiest way. Shouldn't break anything projects from later versions of 4.x.x, despite the warning. there're hacks to get around it for later unity versions, there few threads around the forum here as well as Unity forums.

Edited September 20, 2014 by nli2work
